title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama GitHub repo: self-hostable LLM runner with a built-in model library and simple CLI/API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama—chat, embed, pull, and manage models in a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package that plugs Ollama models into LangChain LLM, embeddings, and tool-calling pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; no backend code needed.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with reactive streams and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API for Rails scripting.

title: ollama-cli-crystal
summary: Crystal-lang CLI and library for chatting with Ollama models interactively.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Docker-Compose templates for Ollama + Open-WebUI + GPU support in a single command.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri desktop app (Rust+React) that talks to a local Ollama server.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal reference implementation of retrieval-augmented generation using Ollama + Chroma.

title: ollama-digital-assistant
summary: Reddit thread discussing a self-hosted Jarvis-like assistant built on Ollama + Home-Assistant.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Merged NixOS package for Ollama enabling declarative GPU-accelerated deployments.

title: ollama-hackernews-discuss
summary: Hacker News discussion on running Llama-3 locally with Ollama and performance benchmarks.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI copilot sidebar powered by any Ollama model.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Custom n8n node (npm) to integrate Ollama chat/completion steps into no-code workflows.
